title: Hong Kong woman, 70, challenges rioters
text:
chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-08 13:35

A 70-year-old woman, infuriated by protestors' destruction of Hong Kong, set herself the task of clearing road barriers erected by anti-government rioters.

She knew her task was near impossible as throngs of rioters quickly put them back up and provoked her with laser beams.

Heartbroken to see her home city in tatters, she challenged the protestors and reporters by asking the question: "Where is your conscience"?

She slammed the protestors for their violence and destruction.

In an exchange with a reporter, she also called into question the role of the media, which she said aided and abetted the rioters.
